local_rpms.name: yeti-scripts
local_rpms.command: ls -ald /run/colorize/iam/$(if [[ "$(hostname -s)" == *fey* ]] || [[ "$SLURM_SUBMIT_HOST" == *fey* ]] || [[ "$(hostname -s)" == *rfe* ]] || [[ "$SLURM_SUBMIT_HOST" == *rfe* ]] ; then echo "YELLOW"; else echo "TURQUOISE"; fi)

var.cpuspeedcmd: `egrep "cpu MHz" /proc/cpuinfo | uniq | awk '{print $4}' | awk -F. '{ s = $1 / 1000 } END {print s}'`

hpl_single.summary: Los Alamos National Laboratory PRETeam Benchmark
